SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

org.gridgain.grid
Class GridSystemProperties

java.lang.Object
  org.gridgain.grid.GridSystemProperties

public final class GridSystemProperties
extends Object

Contains constants for all system properties and environmental variables in GridGain. These properties and variables can be used to affect the behavior of GridGain.

Wiki & Forum:


Wiki
Forum

See Also:

Field Detail

GG_DEBUG_ENABLED

public static final String GG_DEBUG_ENABLED
Property identifying whether GridGain debug is enabled or not. If enabled, the standard logger configuration will be used, otherwise logger settings will be bypassed and debug won't be printed.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

GG_LOG_GRID_NAME

public static final String GG_LOG_GRID_NAME
If this system property is present the GridGain will include grid name into verbose log.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

GG_RESTART_CODE

public static final String GG_RESTART_CODE
This property is used internally to pass an exit code to loader when GridGain instance is being restarted.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

GG_DAEMON

public static final String GG_DAEMON
Presence of this system property with value true will make the grid node start as a daemon node. Node that this system property will override GridConfiguration.isDaemon() configuration.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

GG_HOME

public static final String GG_HOME
Defines GridGain installation folder.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

GG_SCRIPT

public static final String GG_SCRIPT
Defines GridGain property indicating support for ANSI escape sequences.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

GG_NO_SHUTDOWN_HOOK

public static final String GG_NO_SHUTDOWN_HOOK
If this system property is set to false - no shutdown hook will be set.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

GG_NO_DISCO_ORDER

public static final String GG_NO_DISCO_ORDER
Name of the system property to disable requirement for proper node ordering by discovery SPI. Use with care, as proper node ordering is required for cache consistency. If set to true, then any discovery SPI can be used with distributed cache, otherwise, only discovery SPIs that have annotation @GridDiscoverySpiOrderSupport(true) will be allowed.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

GG_UPDATE_NOTIFIER

public static final String GG_UPDATE_NOTIFIER
If this system property is set to false - no checks for new versions will be performed by GridGain. By default, GridGain periodically checks for the new version and prints out the message into the log if new version of GridGain is available for download.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

GG_STARVATION_CHECK_INTERVAL

public static final String GG_STARVATION_CHECK_INTERVAL
This system property defines interval in milliseconds in which GridGain will check thread pool state for starvation. Zero value will disable this checker.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

GG_NO_ASCII

public static final String GG_NO_ASCII
If this system property is present (any value) - no ASCII logo will be printed.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

GG_JETTY_HOST

public static final String GG_JETTY_HOST
This property allows to override Jetty host for REST processor.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

GG_JETTY_PORT

public static final String GG_JETTY_PORT
This property allows to override Jetty local port for REST processor.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

GG_REST_MAX_TASK_RESULTS

public static final String GG_REST_MAX_TASK_RESULTS
This property allows to override maximum count of task results stored on one node in REST processor.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

GG_QUIET

public static final String GG_QUIET
Set to either true or false to enable or disable quiet mode of GridGain. In quiet mode, only warning and errors are printed into the log additionally to a shortened version of standard output on the start.

Note that if you use ggstart.{sh|bat} scripts to start GridGain they start by default in quiet mode. You can supply -v flag to override it.

Note also that in quiet mode no other log is produced (no INFO or DEBUG even if they are enabled in the log configuration).

See Also:
Constant Field Values

GG_DFLT_LOG4J_DEBUG

public static final String GG_DFLT_LOG4J_DEBUG
If set to any value will set default log level for Log4j to DEBUG.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

GG_PROG_NAME

public static final String GG_PROG_NAME
Name of the system property defining name of command line program.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

GG_SUCCESS_FILE

public static final String GG_SUCCESS_FILE
Name of the system property defining success file name. This file is used with auto-restarting functionality when GridGain is started by supplied ggstart.{bat|sh} scripts.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

GG_SMTP_HOST

public static final String GG_SMTP_HOST
Name of the system property or environment variable to set or override SMTP host. If provided - it will override the property in grid configuration.

Note that GridGain uses SMTP to send emails in critical situations such as license expiration or fatal system errors. It is highly recommended to configure SMTP in production environment.

See Also:
GridConfiguration.getSmtpHost(), Constant Field Values

GG_SMTP_PORT

public static final String GG_SMTP_PORT
Name of the system property or environment variable to set or override SMTP port. If provided - it will override the property in grid configuration.

Note that GridGain uses SMTP to send emails in critical situations such as license expiration or fatal system errors. It is highly recommended to configure SMTP in production environment.

See Also:
GridConfiguration.getSmtpPort(), GridConfiguration.DFLT_SMTP_PORT, Constant Field Values

GG_SMTP_USERNAME

public static final String GG_SMTP_USERNAME
Name of the system property or environment variable to set or override SMTP username. If provided - it will override the property in grid configuration.

Note that GridGain uses SMTP to send emails in critical situations such as license expiration or fatal system errors. It is highly recommended to configure SMTP in production environment.

See Also:
GridConfiguration.getSmtpUsername(), Constant Field Values

GG_SMTP_PWD

public static final String GG_SMTP_PWD
Name of the system property or environment variable to set or override SMTP password. If provided - it will override the property in grid configuration.

Note that GridGain uses SMTP to send emails in critical situations such as license expiration or fatal system errors. It is highly recommended to configure SMTP in production environment.

See Also:
GridConfiguration.getSmtpPassword(), Constant Field Values

GG_SMTP_FROM

public static final String GG_SMTP_FROM
Name of the system property or environment variable to set or override SMTP FROM email. If provided - it will override the property in grid configuration.

Note that GridGain uses SMTP to send emails in critical situations such as license expiration or fatal system errors. It is highly recommended to configure SMTP in production environment.

See Also:
GridConfiguration.getSmtpFromEmail(), GridConfiguration.DFLT_SMTP_FROM_EMAIL, Constant Field Values

GG_ADMIN_EMAILS

public static final String GG_ADMIN_EMAILS
Name of the system property or environment variable to set or override list of admin emails. Value of this property should be comma-separated list of emails. If provided - it will override the property in grid configuration.

Note that GridGain uses SMTP to send emails in critical situations such as license expiration or fatal system errors. It is highly recommended to configure SMTP in production environment.

See Also:
GridConfiguration.getAdminEmails(), Constant Field Values

GG_SMTP_SSL

public static final String GG_SMTP_SSL
Name of the system property or environment variable to set or override whether or not to use SSL. If provided - it will override the property in grid configuration.

Note that GridGain uses SMTP to send emails in critical situations such as license expiration or fatal system errors. It is highly recommended to configure SMTP in production environment.

See Also:
GridConfiguration.isSmtpSsl(), GridConfiguration.DFLT_SMTP_SSL, Constant Field Values

GG_LIFECYCLE_EMAIL_NOTIFY

public static final String GG_LIFECYCLE_EMAIL_NOTIFY
Name of the system property or environment variable to set or override whether or not to enable email notifications for node lifecycle. If provided - it will override the property in grid configuration.

See Also:
GridConfiguration.isLifeCycleEmailNotification(), Constant Field Values

GG_SMTP_STARTTLS

public static final String GG_SMTP_STARTTLS
Name of the system property or environment variable to set or override whether or not to use STARTTLS. If provided - it will override the property in grid configuration.

Note that GridGain uses SMTP to send emails in critical situations such as license expiration or fatal system errors. It is highly recommended to configure SMTP in production environment.

See Also:
GridConfiguration.isSmtpStartTls(), GridConfiguration.DFLT_SMTP_STARTTLS, Constant Field Values

GG_LOCAL_HOST

public static final String GG_LOCAL_HOST
Name of system property to set system-wide local IP address or host. If provided it will override all default local bind settings within GridGain or any of its SPIs.

Note that system-wide local bind address can also be set via GridConfiguration.getLocalHost() method. However, system properties have priority over configuration properties specified in GridConfiguration.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

GG_FUT_SYNC_NOTIFICATION

public static final String GG_FUT_SYNC_NOTIFICATION
Name of the system property or environment variable to activate synchronous listener notification for future objects implemented in GridGain. I.e. closure passed into method GridFuture.listenAsync(GridInClosure) will be evaluated in the same thread that will end the future.

See Also:
GridFuture.syncNotify(), Constant Field Values

GG_FUT_CONCURRENT_NOTIFICATION

public static final String GG_FUT_CONCURRENT_NOTIFICATION
Name of the system property or environment variable to activate concurrent listener notification for future objects implemented in GridGain. I.e. upon future completion every listener will be notified concurrently in a separate thread.

See Also:
GridFuture.concurrentNotify(), Constant Field Values

GG_STOPWATCH_ENABLED

public static final String GG_STOPWATCH_ENABLED
System property to enable or disable stop watch (true or false, default is false). If enabled, GridGain will watch various internal execution points and will print out stats at the end.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

GG_STOPWATCH_PRINTSTEP

public static final String GG_STOPWATCH_PRINTSTEP
If GridSystemProperties.GG_STOPWATCH_ENABLED is true, then this property will control whether or not to print out every execution step or not.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

GG_DEP_MODE_OVERRIDE

public static final String GG_DEP_MODE_OVERRIDE
System property to override deployment mode configuration parameter. Valid values for property are: PRIVATE, ISOLATED, SHARED or CONTINUOUS.

See Also:
GridDeploymentMode, GridConfiguration.getDeploymentMode(), Constant Field Values

GG_ASSERT_SEND_DISABLED

public static final String GG_ASSERT_SEND_DISABLED
System property to disable emailing of assertion errors.

See Also:
GridThread, Constant Field Values

GG_MAX_COMPLETED_TX_COUNT

public static final String GG_MAX_COMPLETED_TX_COUNT
Property controlling size of buffer holding completed transaction versions. Such buffer is used to detect duplicate transaction and has a default value of 102400. In most cases this value is large enough and does not need to be changed.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

GG_MAP_CONCURRENCY_LEVEL

public static final String GG_MAP_CONCURRENCY_LEVEL
Concurrency level for all concurrent hash maps created by GridGain.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

GG_SLOW_TX_WARN_TIMEOUT

public static final String GG_SLOW_TX_WARN_TIMEOUT
Transactions that take more time, than value of this property, will be output to log with warning level. 0 (default value) disables warning on slow transactions.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

GG_OVERRIDE_MCAST_GRP

public static final String GG_OVERRIDE_MCAST_GRP
System property to override multicast group taken from configuration. Used for testing purposes.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

GG_REFLECTION_CACHE_SIZE

public static final String GG_REFLECTION_CACHE_SIZE
System property to override default reflection cache size. Default value is 128.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

GG_CONFIG_URL

public static final String GG_CONFIG_URL
System property to hold optional configuration URL.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
